overview.en: Trip.org is a new business model of tourism service platform: taking hotels, air tickets and train tickets as the entry point, it is committed to building a blockchain travel consumption ecology and creating a truly C-terminal travel service platform that subverts traditional companies. With minority shareholders enjoying the rights and interests of the company, the real user is the owner.
overview.zh: Trip.org是一个新型商业模式的旅游服务平台：以酒店、机票、火车票等为切入点，致力于构建区块链旅行消费生态，打造出一个真正属于C端的旅游服务平台，颠覆了传统公司由少数股东享有公司权益的格局，真正实现了使用者即为所有者。
